supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals (Industrial - Electricity)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and not(local-name()='AgSupplySector') and not(@name='domestic water') and not(@name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='industry') and not(@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water withdrawals')]/demand-physical/node()
